successes.title: Mythic Legions Action Figures by Four Horsemen Studios
successes.description: Mythic Legions is a line of beautifully detailed and fully articulated 6" scale fantasy action figures by Four Horsemen Studios

Pledges.description: 1) THANK YOU! Thank you for your support of Mythic Legions.
2) MYTHIC LEGIONS ART BOOK-US! This collector's book contains a Mythic Legions Comic, behind the scenes info and much more. Shipped to your US address. Ships in the continental US only!
3) MYTHIC LEGIONS ART BOOK -INTERNATIONAL! This collector's book contains a Mythic Legions Comic, behind the scenes info and much more. Shipped to your International address. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

48) MYTHIC LEGIONS 16 PIECE ASSORTMENT- US! The entire 16 piece assortment of standard Mythic Legions action figures! Includes Sir Gideon Heavensbrand, Gorgo Aetherblade, Thord Ironjaw, Skapular the Cryptbreaker, Sir Galeron, Orn Steelhide, Clavian, Attila Leossyr, Sir Owain, Jorund Runeshaper, Tibius, Otho, Sir Ignatius, Bothar Shadowhorn, and Carpathias along with a Mythic Legions Art Book shipped to your US address. Ships within continental US only!

49) MYTHIC LEGIONS 16 PIECE ASSORTMENT- INTERNATIONAL! The entire 16 piece assortment of standard Mythic Legions action figures! Includes Sir Gideon Heavensbrand, Gorgo Aetherblade, Thord Ironjaw, Skapular the Cryptbreaker, Sir Galeron, Orn Steelhide, Clavian, Attila Leossyr, Sir Owain, Jorund Runeshaper, Tibius, Otho, Sir Ignatius, Bothar Shadowhorn, and Carpathias along with a Mythic Legions Art Book shipped to your International address. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

50) DELUXE MYTHIC LEGIONS 16 PIECE ASSORTMENT- US! Have your face drawn on a character in the Mythic Legions comic book plus receive the entire 16 piece assortment of standard Mythic Legions action figures! Includes Sir Gideon Heavensbrand, Gorgo Aetherblade, Thord Ironjaw, Skapular the Cryptbreaker, Sir Galeron, Orn Steelhide, Clavian, Attila Leossyr, Sir Owain, Jorund Runeshaper, Tibius, Otho, Sir Ignatius, Bothar Shadowhorn, and Carpathias along with a Mythic Legions Art Book shipped to your US address. Ships within continental US only!

51) DELUXE MYTHIC LEGIONS 16 PIECE ASSORTMENT- INTERNATIONAL! Have your face drawn on a character in the Mythic Legions comic book plus receive the entire 16 piece assortment of standard Mythic Legions action figures! Includes Sir Gideon Heavensbrand, Gorgo Aetherblade, Thord Ironjaw, Skapular the Cryptbreaker, Sir Galeron, Orn Steelhide, Clavian, Attila Leossyr, Sir Owain, Jorund Runeshaper, Tibius, Otho, Sir Ignatius, Bothar Shadowhorn, and Carpathias along with a Mythic Legions Art Book shipped to your International address. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

52) ULTRA MYTHIC LEGIONS 16 PIECE ASSORTMENT! Have your face drawn on a character in the Mythic Legions comic book, receive the original comic book art that has your likeness included, plus receive the entire 16 piece assortment of standard Mythic Legions action figures! Includes Sir Gideon Heavensbrand, Gorgo Aetherblade, Thord Ironjaw, Skapular the Cryptbreaker, Sir Galeron, Orn Steelhide, Clavian, Attila Leossyr, Sir Owain, Jorund Runeshaper, Tibius, Otho, Sir Ignatius, Bothar Shadowhorn, and Carpathias along with a Mythic Legions Art Book shipped to any address. SHIPS ANYWHERE!

54) MYTHIC LEGIONS ALL-IN - US!! This massive package includes one of all of the rewards and stretch goals being offered through the Mythic Legions Kickstarter. Does not include figure stands. Includes Silver Knight, Gold Knight, Bronze Dwarf, Silver Dwarf, Standard Skeleton, Golden Skeleton, Sir Gideon Heavensbrand, Gorgo Aetherblade, Thord Ironjaw, Skapular the Cryptbreaker, Sir Galeron, Orn Steelhide, Clavian, Atilla Leossyr, Sir Owain, Jorund Runeshaper, Tibius, Otho, Sir Ignatius, Bothar Shadowhorn, Carpathias, Attilus the Conquerer, Urkku, Vitus, Asterion, Azhar, Zazhar, the Kickstarter exclusive - Sir Valgard, Urzokk, Bog Goblin, Malleus, Orc Deluxe Legion Builder, Deluxe Barbarian Builder Set, the FANtastic Exclusive vote winner, Mythic Legions Art Book, Heroic Weapons Pack, Evil Weapons Pack, Weapons Pack 1, Weapons Pack 2, Weapons Pack 3 (if unlocked at $210,000.00), Weapons Pack 4 (if unlocked at $215,000.00)! All shipped to your US address. Ships within continental US only!

55) MYTHIC LEGIONS ALL-IN - International!! This massive package includes one of all of the rewards and stretch goals being offered through the Mythic Legions Kickstarter. Does not include figure stands. Includes Silver Knight, Gold Knight, Bronze Dwarf, Silver Dwarf, Standard Skeleton, Golden Skeleton, Sir Gideon Heavensbrand, Gorgo Aetherblade, Thord Ironjaw, Skapular the Cryptbreaker, Sir Galeron, Orn Steelhide, Clavian, Atilla Leossyr, Sir Owain, Jorund Runeshaper, Tibius, Otho, Sir Ignatius, Bothar Shadowhorn, Carpathias, Attilus the Conquerer, Urkku, Vitus, Asterion, Azhar, Zazhar, the Kickstarter exclusive - Sir Valgard, Urzokk, Bog Goblin, Malleus, Orc Deluxe Legion Builder, Deluxe Barbarian Builder Set, the FANtastic Exclusive vote winner, Mythic Legions Art Book, Heroic Weapons Pack, Evil Weapons Pack, Weapons Pack 1, Weapons Pack 2, Weapons Pack 3 (if unlocked at $210,000.00), Weapons Pack 4 (if unlocked at $215,000.00)! All shipped to your International address. International shipping!

53) HAVE YOUR HEAD SCULPTED ON A MYTHIC LEGIONS FIGURE! One backer will have his or her face sculpted into an alternate head for a Mythic Legions character who will also be built in as a character to the story. Backer will receive 6 hand casted and hand painted heads for use with Mythic Legions figures shipped to your address. We will reserve the right to put the head into full production in a future assortment. Backer will be required to sign permission for use of likeness rights and provide reference. Ships anywhere!
